verses.text: Paul here — God’s servant, reppin’ Jesus Christ. Sent to build faith in God’s elect and drop truth that actually transforms.
This truth rests on eternal life — the promise God made way back. And God don’t cap, so yeah, it’s locked in.
Now at the right time, He made His Word go public — and I got tagged to preach it by His command.
To Titus, my legit spiritual son — grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior.
I left you in Crete so you could fix what’s messy and appoint elders who actually have sense — like I told you.
Pick blameless guys, loyal to one wife, kids that don’t act wild or disrespect.
A church leader’s gotta be clean — no arrogance, no quick temper, no addiction, no drama, no greed.
Instead, they gotta be chill, love people, self-controlled, holy, and locked into good vibes only (the godly kind).
They gotta know the Word so deep that they can teach it and clap back at fake teachings confidently.
Cuz a lotta loudmouths out there just talk nonsense — especially those trying to twist stuff for money.
You gotta shut that down. They wreck whole families with fake doctrine for clout and coins.
Even one of their own said, “Cretans are always liars, lazy, and greedy.” Brutal but kinda true.
Paul said, “Yup, facts. So rebuke them hard, so their faith gets real.”
Don’t let ‘em chase human myths or legalistic junk that distracts from the gospel.
To pure hearts, everything’s pure. But for the corrupted, even good stuff looks dirty, ‘cause their minds are fried.
They say they know God, but their actions expose ‘em — fake believers, useless in every good thing.
You, Titus, speak straight — sound teaching, no cap.
Old men? Calm, wise, dignified, solid in faith, love, and patience.
Old women? Chill, no gossip, no shady drama, teach what’s good.
Train the young women — love their fam, self-controlled, pure, kind, always ready to do good.
So they don’t trash God’s Word with bad behavior — they gotta shine.
Young men? Stay self-controlled, lead with integrity, faith, love, endurance. Level up daily.
Show yourself as a model of good works — integrity, solid speech, wholesome teaching. That way, haters can’t clap back.
Live clean — teaching aligns with your actions. No cap, practice what you preach.
Slaves? Respect your masters in everything — please them, not just when they watch. No eye-rolling.
Do good, don’t steal, don’t cheat. Make the Word of God shine even when your life’s tough.
God’s grace came through to save everyone — teaching us to ditch sin and live righteous lives.
We’re not here just chilling — gotta say “no” to wild desires and “yes” to godly living. Time to level up spiritually.
Looking forward to Jesus Christ’s return — the big Day of glory, hope fully unlocked.
He gave Himself for us, freeing us from all bad vibes, purifying for His own squad, ready to do good forever.
Remind them to live this way. Speak with authority — don’t let anyone clown you. Live it, teach it, enforce it.
Remind people to respect leaders, obey the rules, and stay ready to do good. No cap — civics and holiness both matter.
No gossip, no fighting, no drama. Be chill with everyone.
Back in the day, we were wild — selfish, arrogant, obsessed with pleasure. Life was chaotic.
But then God’s kindness and love showed up — full glow-up through Christ our Savior.
He didn’t save us because of our messy deeds, but because of His mercy — He gave us new life via the Holy Spirit.
Jesus poured Himself out for us, so we could rise with hope and live clean.
Now we’re heirs — hope locked in — not because we earned it, but because God’s promise is real.
This message is solid, trustworthy, and worth doubling down on. God’s truth = foundation, fam.
Avoid pointless fights about myths and genealogies — they just fuel arguments, not faith.
Warn divisive people once, maybe twice. Then ghost them. Why waste energy on chaos?
You know these folks are corrupt, sinful, self-condemned. No redemption in arguing with them.
I’m sending Artemas or Tychicus to you soon. Be ready — they’ll help you handle the squad.
Help Zenas and Apollos on their grind. Make sure their path is smooth — no roadblocks, full support.
Our mission: teach people to hustle for good works. That way, no one’s wasting time, everyone’s leveling spiritually.
Send greetings to every friend — people who flex in faith. The ones with me send love too.
Grace and peace? Locked in. Stay solid, live right, finish strong.
